data.title: Lucio Fulci filmography
data.text:
FILMS

CLICK ON TITLE LINKS FOR REVIEWS AND PICTURES

DIRECTOR

1992

DOOR TO SILENCE

a.k.a. La Porte cel Silenzio, Door to Silence. 1992.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Aristide Massaccesi (Joe D'Amato). Written by Lucio Fulci. Cinematography by Giancarlo Ferrando. Music by Franco Piana, Enrico Valdambrini. Production Design by Max Slowing. Film Editing by Kathleen Stratton.

Cast: Richard Castleman, Jennifer Loeb, John Savage (Melvin Dovereux), Sandi Schultz (woman).

1990

VOICES FROM BEYOND

a.k.a. Voci dal Profondo (Voices from the Deep). 1990.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Written by Lucio Fulci, Piero Regnoli. Cinematography by Alessandro Grossi. Music by Stelvio Cipriani. Costume Design by Roberta Ciotti. Film Editing by Vincenzo Tomassi.

Cast: Damiano Azzos, Sacha Darwin, Duilio Del Prete (Giorgio Mainardi), Lorenzo Flaherty, Lucio Fulci (Pathologist), Bettina Giovannini, Rosa Maria Grauso, Karina Huff (Rosy), Frances Nacman, Paolo Paoloni, Pascal Persi, Pascal Persiano, Antonella Tinazzo.

NIGHTMARE CONCERT: A CAT IN THE BRAIN

a.k.a. Un Gatto nel cervello: I Tre Volti Del Terrore (A Cat in the Brain: The Faces of Fear), A Cat In the Brain, Nightmare Concert. 1990.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Written by Lucio Fulci, Giovanni Simonelli, Antonio Tentori. Cinematography by Alessandro Grossi. Music by Fabio Frizzi. Film Editing by Vincenzo Tomassi. Produced by Antonio Lucidi, Luigi Nannerini. Make-up by Pino Ferranti. Script girl, production supervisor: Camilla Fulci. Assistant director: Roberto Lucidi. Assistant editor: Paola Tomassi, Claudia Vivenzio. Production manager: Silvano Zignani.

Cast: Lucio Fulci (Dr. Lucio Fulci), David L. Thompson (Psychatrist), Jeoffrey Kennedy (Policeman), Malisa Longo (Psychatrist's wife), Ria De Simone (Sopran), Brett Halsey (Monster), Sacha Darwin (Woman in the oven), Robert Egon (Second monster), Shillett Angel (Producer), Judy Morrow (Nurse), Layla Frank, Georgia Moore, Paul Muller, Marco Di Stefano, Maurice Poli, Lubka Lensi.

DEMONIA

a.k.a. Liza. 1990.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Ettore Spagnuolo. Written by Lucio Fulci, Piero Regnoli. Cinematography by Luigi Ciccarese. Music by Giovanni Cristiani. Costume Design by Massimo Bolongaro. Film Editing by Otello Colangeli. Assistant director: Camilla Fulci. Special effects by Franco Giannini.

Cast: Brett Halsey (Prof. Malcom Evans), Meg Register (Lisa), Lino Salemme, Christina Englehardt, Pascal Druant, Grady Thomas Clarkson, Ettore Comi, Carla Cassola, Michael Aronin, Al Cliver (Porter), Isabella Corradini, Paola Cozzo, Bruna Rossi, Paola Calati, Antonio Melillo, Ruth Anderson, Gianfranco Bonavita, Francesco Biasini, Clorinda Pucci, Kerstin Soderderg, Francesco Cusimano, Lucio Fulci (Inspector Carter).

1989

HOUSE OF CLOCKS

a.k.a. La Casa del tempo (House of Time). TV movie too violent to air. 1989.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Written by Gianfranco Clerici, Lucio Fulci, Daniele Stroppa. Cinematography by Nino Celeste. Music by Vincenzo Tempera. Film Editing by Albert Morris. Assistant director: Camilla Fulci.

Cast: Paolo Bernardi, Carla Cassola, Al Cliver [Pier-Luigi Conti] (Peter), Francesca DeRose, Karina Huff, Massimo Sarchielli, Kieth Van Hoven.

SWEET HOUSE OF HORRORS

a.k.a. La Dolce casa degli orrori. TV movie too violent to air. 1989.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Screenplay-Vincenzo Mannino, Gigliola Battaglini, Lucio Fulci. Cinematography-Nino Celeste.

Cast: Jean-Christophe Bretigner, Cinzia Monreale, Lino Salamme, Vernon Dobtcheff.

1988

SODOMA'S GHOST

a.k.a. I Fantasmi di Sodoma, Ghosts of Sodom. 1988.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Luigi Mannerini, Antonio Lucidi. S/P-Lucio Fulci, Carlo-Alberto Alfieri. Cinematography-Silvano Tessicini. Music-Carlo-Maria Cordio.

Cast: Al Cliver [Pier-Luigi Conti] (Drunken Nazi), Robert Egon (Mark), Claus Aliot (Paul), Alan Johnson (John), Teresa Razzauti (Mary), Gilda Germano (Celine), Jessica Moore (Ann), Sebastian Harrison (Nazi).

TOUCH OF DEATH

a.k.a. Quando Alice Ruppe lo Specchio, When Alice Broke the Mirror, Soupcons De Mort. 1988.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Luigi Mannerini, Antonio Lucidi. Written by Lucio Fulci, Carlo-Alberto Alfieri. Cinematography by Silvano Tessicini. Music by Carlo Maria Cordio.

Cast: Sacha Darwin (Margie Mac Donald), Pier-Luigi Conti (Randy), Ulla Kerowa (Alice), Marco Di Stefano, Brett Halsey (Lester Parsons), Ria Simone (Virginia Field).

1987

ZOMBI 3

a.k.a. Zombie 3. 1987.

Directed by Vincent Dawn [Bruno Mattei], Lucio Fulci. Produced by Franco Gaudenzi. S/P-Claudio Fragasso (aka Clyde Anderson). Cinematography by Riccardo Grassetti. Music by Stefano Mainetti.

Cast: Alex McBride (Bo), Richard Raymond (Roger), Beatrice Ring (Patricia), Deran Sarafian (Kenny), Ulli Reinthaler (Nancy), Michele Monti.

Notes: Fulci was still suffering from hepatitis at this time. Utterly dissatisfied with the way the production was going, Fulci withdrew from the film only directing around 30-40 minutes of the film. Though this film is often directly credited to Fulci, he completely dissowned it, wanting absolutely nothing to do with it.

AENIGMA

1987.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Ettore Spagnuolo. S/P-Giorgio Mariuzzo, Lucio Fulci. Cinematography by Luigi Ciccarese. Music by Carlo-Maria Cordio.

Cast: Riccardo Acerbi, Sophie D'Aulan (Kim), Suzy Kendall, Jared Martin (Dr. Anderson), Jennifer Naud (Grace), Lara Nazinsky (Carol), Caitlin O'Heaney, Ulli Reinthaler (Jenny), Kathi Wise (Virginia), Mijligana Zirojvic (Kathy). Lucio Fulci (Police Inspector).

1986

DANGEROUS OBSESSION

a.k.a. Devil's Honey, Divine Obsession, La Miel del diablo, La Miele del diavolo. 1986.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Franco Casati, Sergio Martinelli. Written by Ludovica Marineo, Jaime Jesus Balcazar, Vincenzo Salviani. Cinematography by Alejandro Ulloa. Music by Claudio Natili. Film Editing by Vincenzo Tomassi.

Cast: Brett Halsey (Dr. Guido Domenici), Corinne Clery (Carole), Blanca Marsillach (Cecillia), Stefano Madia (Gaetano), Paula Molina (Sandra), Bernard Seray (Nicola), Lucio Fulci.

1984

MURDER ROCK

a.k.a. Murderock - Uccide a Passo di Danza (Murderock kills at Dance Pace), Giallo a Disco, Murder Rock - Dancing Death. 1984.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Augusto Caminito. Written by Gianfranco Clerici, Vincenzo Mannino, Luci Fulci. Cinematography by Giuseppe Pinori. Music by Keith Emerson.

Cast: Claudio Cassinelli (Dick), Olga Karlatos (Candice), Ray Lovelock (Webb), Janna Ryan (Margie), Cosimo Cinieri, Christian Borromeo, Al Cliver [Pier-Luigi Conti], Lucio Fulci.

1983

NEW GLADIATORS

a.k.a. I Guerrieri dell anno 2072, Fighting Centurions, Warriors of the Year 2072, Rome 2072, Rome 2033-Fighting Centurions, Rome 2033, Roma Ano 2072 D.C.-Los Gladiadores. 1983.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Edmondo Amati. S/P-Elisa Brigante, Dardano Sacchetti, Lucio Fulci, Cesare Frugoni. Cinematography by Guiseppe Pinori, Aldo Tonti. Music by Riz Ortolani.

Cast: Claudio Cassinelli (Cortez), Al Cliver [Pier-Luigi Conti] (mercenary), Eleanora Brigliadori (Sarah), Jared Martin (Drake), Howard Ross, Fred Williamson (Abdul), Renato Rossini (Raven), Haruhiko Yamanuchi (Asian mercenary), Mario Novelli, Donald O'Brien (Monk).

CONQUEST

a.k.a. La Conguista de la Tierra Perdida. 1983.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Giovanni Di Clemente. S/P-Giovanni Di Clemente, Gino Capone, Jose-Antonio De La Loma, Carlos Vasallo, Lucio Fulci. Cinematography by Alejandro Ulloa. Music by Claudio Simonetti.

Cast: Violeta Cela, Maria Escola, Conrado San Martin, Roberto Gras, Andrea Occhipinti (Ilias), Jorge Rivero (Mace), Sabrina Siani (Ocron).

MANHATTAN BABY

a.k.a. Possessed, L'Occhio del Male (Eye of the Evil Dead), La Malediction du Pharoan, Das Amulet Des Bosen, Paha Silma. 1983.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Fabrizio DeAngelis. Written by Elisa Livia Brigante, Dardano Sacchetti, Lucio Fulci. Cinematography by Guglielmo Mancori. Music by Fabio Frizzi.

Cast: Christopher Connelly (Professor George Hacker), Brigitta Boccoli (Susan Hacker), Cinzia De Ponti (Jamie Lee), Giovanni Frezza (Tommy Hacker), Lucio Fulci (Doctor), Laurence Welles [Cosimo Cinieri] (Adrian Mercato), Martha Taylor (Emily Hacker), Carlo de Mejo (Luke), Vincenzo Bellanich, Mario Moretti, Andrea Bosic.

1982

NEW YORK RIPPER

a.k.a. Lo Squartatore di New York, Ripper, Ripper of New York, El Descuartizador de Nueva York (New York Avenger), L'Eventreur de New York, De Doder Van New York, Blodig Voldtaegt, Der New York Ripper, De Slachter van New York, El Destripador de Nueva York. 1982.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Fabrizio De Angelis. Written by Gianfranco Clerici, Lucio Fulci, Vincenzo Mannino, Dardano Sacchetti. Cinematography by Luigi Kuveiller. Music by Francesco De Masi. Production Design by Massimo Lentini. Costume Design by Massimo Lentini. Film Editing by Vincenzo Tomassi.

Cast: Jack Hedley (Lieutenant Fred Williams), Almanta Keller [Antonella Interlenghi] (Fay Majors), Howard Ross [Renato Rossini] (Mickey Scellenda, "the Greek"), Andrew Painter [Andrea Occhipinti] (Peter Bunch), Alexandra Delli Colli (Jane Forrester Lodge), Paolo Malco (Dr. Paul Davis), Cinzia De Ponti (Rosie the ferry victim), Laurence Welles [Cosimo Cinieri (Dr. Lodge), Daniela Doria (Kitty the prostitute), Babette New (Mrs. Weissburger), Zora Kerova (Eva, female participant in the sex show), Paul E. Guskin, Anthon Kagan, Josh Cruze, Marsha MacBride, Rita Silva, Giordano Falzoni (Dr. Barry Jones, the coroner), Lucio Fulci (Chief of Police), Barbara Cupisti, Martin Sorrentino, Violetta Jean, Cesare Di Vito, Elisa Cervi, Chiara Ferrari.

1981

HOUSE BY THE CEMETERY

a.k.a. Quella villa accanto al cimitero, House Outside the Cemetery, Qilla Accanto al Cimitero, Aquella Casa a lado del Cemeterio, Freudstein, La Maison Pres du Cimetiere, Slagtehuset ved Kirkegarden, Das Haus an der Friendhofsmauer, Het Huis Bij Het Kerkhof. 1981.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Fabrizio DeAngelis. Written by Lucio Fulci, Giorgio Mariuzzo, Dardano Sacchetti, Elisa Brigante. Cinematography by Sergio Salvati. Music by Walter Rizzato. Special effects by Giannetto De Rossi.

Cast: Silvia Collatina (Mae Freudstein), Carlo De Mejo (Wheatley), Giovanni De Nava (Dr. Freudstein), Daniela Doria (first victim), Giovanni Frezza (Bob Boyle), Dagmar Lassander (Laura Gittleson), Catriona MacColl (Lucy Boyle), Paolo Malco (Norman Boyle), Ania Pieroni (Ann, the babysitter), Lucio Fulci (Proffesor), John Olson, Giampaolo Saccarola (Daniel Douglas, the librarian), Elmer Johnson, Ranieri Ferrara, Teresa Rossi Passante (Mary Freudstein).

BLACK CAT

a.k.a. Il Gatto nero, La Chat Noir, Il Gatto Nero di Park Lane (Black Cat of Park Lane), Musta Kissa, Le Griffes de la Terreur, Het Mysterie Van de Zwarte Kat, O Gato Preto, El Gato Negro. 1981.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Ennio Onorati, Antonio Da Padova. Written by Lucio Fulci, Edgar Allan Poe (story) , Biagio Proietti. Cinematography by Sergio Salvati. Music by Pino Donaggio. Film Editing by Vincenzo Tomassi.

Cast: Al Cliver [Pier-Luigi Conti] (Sgt. Wilson), Geoffrey Copleston (Insp. Flynn), Daniela Doria (Maureen), Mimsy Farmer (Jill Trevers), Dagmar Lassander (Lilian), Patrick Magee (Professor Robert Miles), David Warbeck (Inspector Gorley), Bruno Corazzari (Ferguson, the drunk).

BEYOND

a.k.a. E tu vivrai nel terrore - L'aldilà (And you will live in terror...the Beyond), L'Aldilà (The Afterlife), Seven Doors of Death (Fulci credited as Louis Fuller), Die Geisterstadt der Zombies, Uber Dem Jenseits, Hotel Der Verdoemden, As Sete Portas do Inferno, El Mas Alla. 1981.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Fabrizio DeAngelis. Written by Lucio Fulci, Giorgio Mariuzzo, Dardano Sacchetti. Cinematography by Sergio Salvati. Music by Fabio Frizzi. Costume Design by Massimo Lentini. Film Editing by Vincenzo Tomassi. Special effects by Giannetto De Rossi.

Cast: David Warbeck (Dr. John MacCabe), Catriona MacColl (Liza Merrill), Antonella Interlenghi (Emily), Sarah Keller (Emily), Antoine Saint-John (Schweik, the painter), Veronica Lazar (Martha), Anthony Flees (Larry), Giovanni De Nava (Joe the plumber), Al Cliver [Pier-Luigi Conti] (Dr. Harris), Michele Mirabella (Martin Avery, the architect), Gianpaolo Saccarola (Arthur), Maria Pia Marsala (Jill), Laura De Marchi (Mary Ann), Lucio Fulci (librarian).

1980

CITY OF THE LIVING DEAD

a.k.a. Paura nella città dei morti viventi, Fear in the City of the Living Dead, Fear, Gates of Hell, Twilight of the Dead, Miedo en la Ciudad de los Muertos Vivientos, Ein Zombie Ling am Glockenseil, Eintoter Hing am Glockenseil, Blood Orgy, Frayeurs. 1980.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Fabrizio DeAngeles. Written by Lucio Fulci, Dardano Sacchetti. Cinematography by Sergio Salvati. Music by Fabio Frizzi. Production Design by Giovanni Masini. Costume Design by Massimo Antonello Geleng. Film Editing by Vincenzo Tomassi. Special effects by Giannetto De Rossi.

Cast: Christopher George (Peter Bell), Catriona MacColl (Mary Woodhouse), Carlo De Mejo (Jerry), Antonella Interlenghi (Emily Robbins), John Morghen [Giovanni Lombardo Radicci] (Bob), Daniela Doria (Rose Kelvin), Fabrizio Jovine (John Robbins), Luca Paisner, Michele Soavi (Tommy Fisher), Venantino Venantini (Ross), Enzo D'Ausilio, Adelaide Aste, Luciano Rossi (Father William Thomas), Robert Sampson, Janet Agren (Sandra), Lucio Fulci (Dr. Joe Thompson).

CONTRABAND

a.k.a. Luca il contrabbandiere, The Napels Connections, The Smuggler, Luke The Smuggler, Luca, Le Contrebandier, La Guerre Des Gangs, Das Syndikat des Gravens, Luca El Contrabandista, Mean Blood, Vicious. 1980.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Sandra Infascelli. S/P-Ettore Sanzo, Gianni De Chiara, Giorgio Mariuzzo, Lucio Fulci. Cinematography by Sergio Salvati. Music by Fabio Frizzi.

Cast: Marcel Bozzuffi (Francois Jacquet "the Marsigliese"), Ivana Monti (Adele Di Angelo), Guido Alberti (Don Morrone), Saverio Marconi (Perlante), Venatino Venantini (Tarantini), Ajita Wilson (Luisa), Ofelia Meyer (Ingrid), Romano Puppo (thug), Giordana Falzoni (Charlie), Daniele Dublino (Assistant Prosecutor), Alberti Guico, Fabrizio Jovine (Fancucco Di Angelo, Luca's son), Enrico Maisto, Giulio Farnese (Mickey Di Angelo, Luca's brother), Fabio Testi (Luca Di Angelo), Ferdinando Murolo (Scherino), Lucio Fulci (gunman).

1979

ZOMBIE

a.k.a. Gli Ultimi zombi, Island of the Living Dead, Sanguelia, Zombi 2, Zombie, Zombie 2: The Dead Are Among Us, Zombie Flesh-Eaters, Die Schreckensinsel der Zombies, Nueva York Bajo el Terror de los Zombies, L'Enfer des Zombies. 1979. 92 min.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Gianfranco Couyoumdjian (associate), Fabrizio De Angelis, Ugo Tucci. Written by Elisa Briganti, Dardano Sacchetti. Cinematography by Sergio Salvati. Music by Fabio Frizzi, Giorgio Tucci. Production Design by Antonio Mazza, Walter Patriarca. Costume Design by Walter Patriarca. Film Editing by Vincenzo Tomassi. Special effects by Giannetto De Rossi.

Cast: Tisa Farrow (Ann Bowles), Ian McCulloch (Peter West), Richard Johnson (Dr. David Menard), Al Cliver [Pier-Luigi Conti] (Bryan Curt (US: Brian Hull)), Auretta Gay (Susan), Stefania D'Amario (Nurse), Olga Karlatos (Paola Menard), Ugo Bologna, Mónica Zanchi, Dakkar (Lucas), Lucio Fulci (Editor in chief).

1978

UN UOMO DA RIDERE

1978.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Television comedy.

Cast: Franco Franchi, Silvio Spadecci, Gloria Paul, Mario Merola.

SILVER SADDLE

a.k.a. Sella d'argento, Man in the Silver Saddle. 1978.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Angelo Rizzoli. S/P-Adriano Bolzoni. Cinematography by Sergio Salvati. Music by Fabio Frizzi, Franco Bixio, Vincenzo Tempera.

Cast: Giuliano Gemma, (Roy Blood), Sven Valsecchi (Thomas Barret Jr.), Ettore Manni (Thomas Barret), Cinzia Monreale (Margaret Barrett), Geoffrey Lewis (2 Strike Snake), Donald O'Brien (Fletcher), Philippe Hersent (Sheriff), Aldo Sambrell (Garrincha), Licinia Lentini.

1977

PSYCHIC

a.k.a. 7 note in nero, Murder to the Tune of the Seven Black Notes, Seven Notes in Black, Sette Note in Nero, Seven Black Notes, Don't Look Now, Dolce Come Marire, Death Tolls Seven Times, L'Emmuree Vivante. 1977.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Franco Cuccu. Written by Lucio Fulci, Roberto Gianviti, Dardano Sacchetti. Cinematography by Sergio Salvati. Music by Fabio Bixio, Fabio Frizzi, Vincenzo Tempera. Music conducted by Vincenzo Tempera.

Cast: Luigi Diberti, Gabriele Ferzetti (Rospini), Ida Galli (Gloria Ducci), Gianni Garko (Francesco Ducci), Fabrizio Jovine, Jennifer O'Neill (Virginia Ducci), Vito Passeri, Evelyn Stewert [Ida Galli], Riccardo Parisio Perrotti, Marc Porel (Lucca Fattori), Jenny Tamburi [Luciana Della Robbia] (Paola), Bruno Corazzari (Canovari), Fabrizio Jovine (Commissioner D'Elia).

1976

MAGISTRATE

a.k.a. La Pretora, On A Demande la Main de ma Sceur. 1976.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Ermanno Donati. S/P-Franco Marotta, Laura Toscano, Franco Mercuri. Cinematography by Luciano Trasatti. Music by Nico Fidenco.

Cast: Edwige Fenech (Judge Rosa Orlando), Giancarlo Dettori (Alteri), Gianni Agus (Angelo Scotti), Oreste Lionello (Francesco), Mario Maranzana (Bortolon), Raf Luca (Esposito), Lucio Fulci.

1975

DRACULA IN THE PROVINCES

a.k.a. Il Cav. Costante Nicosia demoniaco ovvero Dracula in brianza (The Demonic Cavalier Constante Nicosia..or Dracula in Brianza), Muerdame Senore Conde (Bite Me..Mr. Count). 1975.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Ermanno Donati. Written by Mario Amendola, Pupi Avati, Bruno Corbucci. Cinematography by Sergio Salvati. Music by Franco Bixio, Vincenzo Tempera, Fabio Frizzi.

Cast: Rossano Brazzi (Doctor), Lando Buzzanca (Constante Nicosia), Francesca Romana Coluzzi (Wanda Torsello), Valentina Cortese (Olghina Franchetti), Ciccio Ingrassia (Sorcerer), Sylva Koscina (Mariu Nicosia), Christa Linder (Liu), Moira Orfei (dominatrix), Grazia Spadaro, John Steiner (Count), Ugo Fangareggi (Battai), Janos Bartha, Ilona Staller.

FOUR OF THE APOCALYPSE

a.k.a. I Quattro dell'apocalisse, Les Quatre de L'Apocalypse, Four Gunmen of the Apocalypse, Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse. 1975.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Ermanno Donati. Written by Ennio De Concini. Cinematography by Sergio Salvati. Music by Fabio Frizzi, Franco Bixio, Vincenzo Tempera.

Cast: Harry Baird (Bud), Bruno Corazzari (Lemmy), Lynne Frederick (Bunny), Tomás Milián (Chaco), Donald O'Brien (Sheriff), Michael J. Pollard (Clem), Fabio Testi (Stubby Preston), Adolfo Lastretti (Rev. Sullivan), Lorenzo Robledo.

1974

RETURN OF WHITE FANG

a.k.a. Challenge to White Fang, Ritorno di Zanna Bianca, Le Retour de Buck le Loup, Die Teufelsschlucht der wilden Wölfe. 1974.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Ermanno Donati. Written by Lucio Fulci, Roberto Gianviti, Alberto Silvestri. Cinematography by Silvano Ippoliti. Music by Carlo Rustichelli.

Cast: Harry Carey Jr. (Tarwater), Renato Cestie (Bill), Raimund Harmstorf (Kurt Jansen), Virna Lisi (Evangeline), Franco Nero (Jason Scott), Werner Pochath (Bandit), John Steiner (Beauty Smith), Donald O'Brien (Bandit), Renato De Carmine (Leclerc).

1973

WHITE FANG

a.k.a. Zanna Bianca, Colmillo blanco, Croc-blanc. 1973.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Ermanno Donati. S/P- Roberto Gianviti, Piero Regnolli, Peter Welbeck, Guy Elmes, Thomas Keyes, Guillaume Roux. Cinematography by Erico Menczer. Second unit director: Tonino Ricci. Music by Carlo Rustichelli. 101 min.

Cast: Carole André (Krista Oatley), Ricardo Battaglia (Jim Hall), Harry Carey Jr., Daniele Dublino (Chester), Raimund Harmstorf (Kurl Jansen), Virna Lisi (Evangeline), Daniel Martín (Charlie), Franco Nero (Jason Scott), Fernando Rey (The Priest), John Steiner (Beauty Smith).

1972

DON'T TORTURE A DUCKLING

a.k.a. Non si sevizia un paperino, Fureur Meurriere (Deadly Fury), Angustia de Silencio, La Longue Nult de L'Exorcisme (The Long Night of Exorcism). 1972.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Edmondo Amati. Written by Lucio Fulci, Gianfranco Clerici, Roberto Gianviti. Cinematography by Sergio D'Offizi. Special effects by Carlo Rambaldi. Music by Riz Ortolani.

Cast: Andrea Aureli, Franco Balducci, Florinda Bolkan (sorceress), Barbara Bouchet (Barbara), Rosalia Maggio, Tomás Milián (Martelli), Irene Papas (Amelia Mallone), Vito Passeri, Marc Porel (Father Alberto Mallone), Linda Sini, George Wilson (Francesco), Ugo D'Alessio, Lucio Fulci.

EROTICIST

a.k.a. All'onorevole piacciono le donne (All the Way.. A Lovely Woman), Obsede Malgre Lui. 1972.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Edmondo Amati. Written by Sandro Continenza (as Alessandro Continenza), Lucio Fulci, Ottavio Jemma. Cinematography by Sergio D'Offizi. Music by Fred Bongusto. Costume Design by Luciana Marinucci. Film Editing by Vincenzo Tomassi.

Cast: Lando Buzzanca (Senator Pupis), Laura Antonelli (Sister Hildegard), Lionel Stander (Cardinal Maravidi), Agostina Belli, Renzo Palmer (Father Lucion), Corrado Gaipa, José Quaglio, Arturo Dominici, Eva Czemerys, Anita Strindberg (Mother Superior), Francis Blanche (Father Scirer), Armando Bandini, Christian Aligny, Aldo Puglisi, Claudio Nicastro, Guglielmo Spoletini, Feodor Chaliapin Jr., Luigi Zerbinati, Quinto Parmeggiani, Pupo De Luca, Giovanni Fago, Helen Parker, Filippo De Gara, Giuseppe Fortis, Claudio Dani, Umberto Bellucci, Umberto Di Grazia, Irio Fantini, Casandra Peterson. 105 min.

1971

LIZARD IN A WOMAN'S SKIN

a.k.a. Una Lucertola con la pelle di donna, Una Lagartija con piel de mujer, Schizoid, Carole, Le Venin de la peur, Les Salopes Vont En Enfer. 1971.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Edmondo Amati. Written by Lucio Fulci, Roberto Gianviti, José Luis Martínez Molla, André Tranché. Cinematography by Luigi Kuveiller. Special effects by Carlo Rambaldi. Music by Ennio Morricone.

Cast: Stanley Baker (Inspector Corvin), Florinda Bolkan (Carole Hammond), Edy Gall [Ely Galleani] (Deborah), Leo Genn (Edmond Brighton), Mike A. Kennedy (hippie), Alberto de Mendoza (police sargeant), Silvia Monti (Joan Hammond), Georges Rigaud (Dr. Kerr), Jean Sorel (Frank Hammond), Anita Strindberg (Julia Durer), Penny Brown, Franco Balducci, Ezio Marano, Gaetano Imbroo, Lucio Fulci.

1969

BEATRICE CENCI

1969.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Giorgio Agliani. Written by Lucio Fulci, Roberto Gianviti. Cinematography by Erico Menczer. Music by Angelo Francesco Lavagnino, Silvano Spadaccino. Production Design by Umberto Turco. Costume Design by Mario Giorsi. Film Editing by Antonietta Zita. Assistant Director: Tiziano Cortini. Assistant editor: Giuliano Mattioli.

Cast: John Bartha, Antonio Casagrande (Giacomo Cenci), Ernesto Colli, Gustavo D'Arpe, Umberto D'Orsi, Mirko Ellis, Giuseppe Fortis, Adrienne LaRussa (Beatrice Cenci), Mavie, Calogero Micciche', Tomás Milián (Olimpio), Stefano Oppedisano, Raymond Pellegrin (Cardinal Lanciani), Alfio Petrini, Jerzy Reyzaker, Massimo Sarchielli, Ignazio Spalla (Catalano), Amedeo Trilli, George Wilson (Francesco Cenci), Max Steffen Zacharias.

PERVERSION STORY

a.k.a. Una sull'altra, Una Historia perversa, Una Historia sull'altra, One on Top of the Other. 1969.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Edmondo Amati. Screenplay by Roberto Gianviti, Lucio Fulci, Jose-Luis Martinez. Cinematography by Alejandro Ulloa. Music by Riz Ortolani.

Cast: Faith Domergue (Martha), John Douglas, John Ireland (Detective Wald), Elsa Martinelli (Jane), Marisa Mell (Susan Dumurrier/Monica Weston), Alberto de Mendoza (Henri Dumurrier), Georges Rigaud (Mitchell), Jean Sobieski (Larry), Jean Sorel (George Dumurrier), Bill Vanders, Riccardo Cucciolla (Benjamin Wormser), Guiseppe Addobbati (Brent), Jesus Puente (Police Sergent), Geoffrey Coppleston, Felix Dafauce, Lucio Fulci.

1968

OPERATION SAN PIETRO

a.k.a. Die Abenteuer des Kardinal Braun, Au Diable les Anges, Operation St. Peter's, Operazione San Pietro. 1968.

Directed by Lucio Fulci. Produced by Turi Vasile. Written by Adriano Baracco, Ennio DeConcini, Lucio Fulci, Roberto Gianviti, Paul Hengge. Cinematography by Alfio Contini, Erico Menczer. Music by Ward Swingle, Armando Trovaioli. Film Editing by Ornella Micheli, Elisabeth Neumann-Viertel. Art director:Giorgio Giovannini. 96 min.

PRODUCER & OTHER

MASSACRE

1989.

Directed by Andrea Bianchi. Produced by Lucio Fulci (actually just walking on the set once or twice).

MURDER SECRET

a.k.a. Aunt Marta Does Dreadful Things. 1989.

Directed by Andrea Bianchi. Presented and supervised by Lucio Fulci.

Cast: Lucy Arland, Sacha Darwin, Peter Gabriel, Jessica Moore, Norren Parker.

RED MONKS

a.k.a. I Frati Rosi. 1988.

Directed by Gianni Martucci. Special effects supervisor: Lucio Fulci.

Note: Fulci had nothing to do with this film and subsequently sued the producers to have his name removed from the credits.
